members.name: stateCode

entityReference.explanation: The constantValues below correspond to the attributes of the 'listLookupValues' entityShape which are: {languageTag, displayText, attributeValue, displayOrder}

arguments.explanation: This attribute 'stateCode_display' is added to the 'Blog' entity to provide the localized display text for the value of the listLookup attribute 'stateCode'
arguments.name: stateCode_display

constantValues: Shows whether the blog is active or inactive. Inactive records are read-only and can't be edited unless they are reactivated.

members.description: Shows whether the blog is active or inactive. Inactive records are read-only and can't be edited unless they are reactivated.

members.name: name

constantValues: Shows the name or title of the blog.

members.description: Shows the name or title of the blog.

arguments.explanation: This 'referencesA' relationship to the entity 'PageTemplate' adds the 'archiveTemplateId' attribute below to the 'Blog' entity as a key
arguments.name: addedAttribute

value.name: archiveTemplateId

constantValues: Shows the page template to be used to render the archive page (for example, posts by date, tags, and so on) of the blog.

value.description: Shows the page template to be used to render the archive page (for example, posts by date, tags, and so on) of the blog.

value.description: Shows the page template to be used to render the home/main page of the Blog.

value.description: Shows the page template to be used to render an individual Blog Post belonging to the Blog.
